title: Secure Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement user authentication with multi-factor security and access management.
description: Develop a robust authentication system featuring secure login, multi-factor authentication, and session management to protect user credentials and banking information. Ensure compliance with data privacy and financial security standards, and integrate with the bank’s identity management systems for streamlined access control.

userStories.title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
userStories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in using multi-factor authentication so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.

userStories.title: Session Management
userStories.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically log me out after periods of inactivity so that my data remains secure.

userStories.title: Password Policy Enforcement
userStories.description: As a user, I want to be guided to set a strong password meeting security standards to prevent unauthorized access.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Create a dashboard displaying relevant products and services based on user profiles.
description: Develop a dynamic and personalized dashboard that displays account summaries, eligible products, and service options based on individual user profiles. The interface should provide a streamlined navigation system and quick access to frequently used features.

userStories.title: Dashboard Account Overview
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my account balances, recent transactions, and summary at a glance so I can stay up to date on my finances.

userStories.title: Dynamic Product Recommendations
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see products and services relevant to my profile so that I can explore personalized banking offers.

userStories.title: Quick Access Widgets
userStories.description: As a customer, I want shortcuts for commonly used actions like fund transfers or service requests to manage my banking needs efficiently.

title: Responsive Design and Multi-Device Accessibility
summary: Ensure consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
description: Design and implement a responsive front-end architecture that adjusts seamlessly across device types and screen sizes. Maintain consistent visual design, navigation, and usability for smooth access on all platforms.

userStories.title: Adaptive Layout
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal layout to adapt automatically to my device’s screen size so I can access it comfortably anywhere.

userStories.title: Consistent Branding and Navigation
userStories.description: As a user, I want consistent look-and-feel across devices so I can easily navigate and recognize the portal’s functions.

title: Digital Application and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open new accounts or modify services through guided digital workflows.
description: Create digital workflows that enable customers to request new banking services, open accounts, and perform service modifications. The workflows should minimize user effort using pre-filled data, form validation, and integrated approval paths.

userStories.title: Account Opening Request
userStories.description: As a user, I want to submit an account opening request online so I can avoid visiting the branch.

userStories.title: Service Modification Request
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services easily via the portal to manage my needs digitally.

userStories.title: Prefilled Customer Information
userStories.description: As a user, I want the system to prefill my details in forms so that I can complete tasks quickly.

title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
summary: Enable document submission and draft-saving capabilities.
description: Provide secure file upload capabilities for KYC and supporting documents. Allow users to save incomplete applications as drafts and resume them later without data loss, improving user experience and completion rates.

userStories.title: Document Upload
userStories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary identification and proof documents so that my application can be processed without visiting the branch.

userStories.title: Save Incomplete Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications as drafts so that I can continue later without losing my progress.

title: Notification and Status Tracking System
summary: Implement real-time status tracking and notifications.
description: Build a notification engine to provide real-time tracking of requests with email and in-app alerts for customers. Enable transparency through visual indicators for request statuses within the portal.

userStories.title: Real-Time Status Updates
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to check the progress of my service requests in real time so that I can stay informed about their status.

userStories.title: Email Notifications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email notifications for critical status changes in my requests so that I am always aware of updates.

title: User Activity History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain interaction history and logs of user activities.
description: Create a detailed activity logging system that records all user interactions for tracking and compliance. Provide customers access to their historical data while maintaining secure, immutable logs for auditing.

userStories.title: Customer Interaction History
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view a detailed history of all my past interactions and requests so that I can track my record of services.

userStories.title: Audit Log for Compliance
userStories.description: As a system administrator, I want to maintain immutable logs of all user actions so that we can meet auditing and compliance standards.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate portal with the bank’s core banking system for real-time synchronization.
description: Establish secure integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking platform. Ensure real-time data exchange for accounts, transactions, and customer information, minimizing manual intervention.

userStories.title: Real-Time Data Sync
userStories.description: As a user, I want my portal information to stay updated in real time so that I always see accurate data from the core banking system.

userStories.title: Seamless Transaction Updates
userStories.description: As a user, I want updates made on the portal to reflect instantly in the bank’s backend systems so operations remain consistent.

title: Portal Database and Performance Architecture
summary: Develop an independent, optimized database to support scalability and performance.
description: Design a high-performance, standalone database for the self-service portal. Implement data caching, redundancy, and synchronization logic to optimize speed and ensure reliability during peak loads.

userStories.title: Independent Database Layer
userStories.description: As a system architect, I want the portal to maintain its own database structure so that performance and scalability are independent of the core banking system.

userStories.title: Backup and Recovery Mechanism
userStories.description: As a system admin, I want automated backup and recovery to ensure business continuity and minimal downtime.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement role-based permissions for customers and administrators.
description: Develop a role-based access control system to ensure each user has access only to services allowed by their profile. This secures sensitive data while allowing internal teams to manage permissions at different hierarchy levels.

userStories.title: Customer Role Permissions
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to access only those services that are appropriate for my account type and authorization level.

userStories.title: Administrator Role Management
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign and manage user roles and access permissions so that only authorized personnel can perform administrative actions.
